title: VOTE! Your Favorite ARAM Champ!
body:
If your Fave falls into *other than these: {{champion:115}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:17}} 
Then Please post it in comments :)
